TopicTitle: Wayward Terran Frontier - If you liked FTL...

Articles.Content:
...than this is what you've been waiting for. This game is in early alpha and on Kickstarter right now. It needs all the help it can get!

It combines In depth ship design and crew management with freeroaming Rougelike gameplay.

Check out the Trailer:

Here's the latest free demo: Link
This seems like Firefly and FTL had a video game baby. It looks pretty neat, I shall remember to keep tabs on this.
The link isn't working for me, but this looks like it could have some great potential.

Saw this thread, watched the video, downloaded the demo.

Spent two minutes not having a clue what to do, died horribly to enemy ships, looked over the kickstarter and backed it.

I like the idea of the game, having the ability to make your own ships is cool and it's graphic design should make it easy on PC's.
Another FTL-like game currently in development for iOS and Android, PC version to come later. No combat though...

Hey, theres going to be a new version of Wayward Terran Frontier coming out soon, And holy .... the graphics have changed. Seems really cool! check it out!

http://youtu.be/2bkI2KFgieMÃ¢â‚¬Â

Currently under development still but worth the lookie
